name: Death Park 2: Scary Clown Game
description:
The new chapter of the iconic hoThe new chapter of the iconic horror!

Fight your nightmares, find out the secret of Death Park, solve cool puzzles and save your sister from the terrible clown!

You will have to visit 8 huge locations, including Farland, city hospital, cemetery, sewer and military base.
You will be able to move between the real world and the world of sleep to solve puzzles and fight monsters.

All locations are filled with weapons, puzzles, and various monsters. Where did they come from and what happened there? This is what you have to find out.
Solve puzzles and fight monsters and the clown to rescue your sister and try to escape Farland alive in our scary sci-fi horror game.

Features of Death Park 2:

- Scary clown, many monsters and weapons
- Exciting author's storyline with 8 endings
- Unique puzzles with two difficulty levels
- Huge world: 8 different locations
- Great graphics
- Original author's soundtrack
- Perfect Horror: Intense gameplay, sudden screamers and horrifying atmosphere
